fields.summary: Alloy.version does not match actual version

fields.description: Version should reflect the current version, so when on 1.7.26 it should indicate 1.7.26 and not 1.7.0. I guess it would be nice to have a solution which reads from the package.json
fields.summary: Alloy version not correct when printing Alloy.version
fields.environment:
Im providing a link to the github repository:

line: 30 states `exports.version = '1.7.0';`
